name: Cecilia
text: Very satisfied with service.The whole personnel staff very open to all request.Very good hotel facilities 👍🏽

name: Roberto
text: We came here to relax and chill a bit after 10 full days of travelling all across the country and we hit the right place. Room was really clean, great bathroom (best shower of our trip), really well organized and super comfy. Garden is superb and overall the facility is really well presented. Breakfast was good too. Professional and super kind staff.

name: Valérie
text: personnel au top... massages excellent chambre parfaite

name: Jan
text: Large room, swimming pool and beautiful garden, helpful and kind staff. After a day's journey here was amazing.

name: Bmbs
text: I choose this hotel because of swiminpool and sound insulation. I expect better insulation but still we had here the best privacy, and we had been in 10 different accomodiation in Morroco.

name: Patrizia
text: Everything. Room, surroundings, cleanliness, kindness of staff.

name: Don
text: The outdoor was very nice. There was a bar and attentive staff who served our meals around the pool.

name: Khalid
text: Very spacious room, clean and above all the friendly staff.

name: Coolday
text: Le confort de la chambre, la proximité du centre ville, la gentillesse du personnel.
